resources.string: Search Instagtam username to display profile picture
Error loading Instagram Log in page
Are you sure you want to Log out?
Tap on save on Images/Videos to save them
Please check internet connection then tap refresh
Tap on user icon in stories feed to set favorites
Please check internet connection then refresh
Tap on search icon to search users

1. Open the InstaSP App.

 2. Go to Navigation bar. click on "Download Profile Pic"

 3. Enter username of the person you want to download profile photo of.

 4. Click on "Get" button.

 5. After that bottom right corner you will find 3 icons(Share, Download, Repost).

 6. Click on Download button to save the profile picture.

 7.Click on Repost button to repost on Instagram.

 8.Click on Share button to share on all the available platform.

1. Open InstaSP App.

 2. Screen will open conatining stories of people you follow or you can also search any instagram user.

 3. After clicking on story. you will find all stories of that person.

 4. You can download, Repost and Share as well Bookmark your favorite stories.

1. Open the Instagram app.

 2. Click three dots icon on the top right corner of the person's post. Once open click on "Copy " option.

 3. Now open InstaSP App.

 Go to navigation bar. Click on "Download Post".

 4. Paste the copied URL in the past URL dialogue box.

 5. Click on "Download" button to save the post.
